Title: Relates to circumstances under which a consumer may be subject to a new special open enrollment period to choose a new health insurance plan
Summary: Allows for a new special open enrollment period to choose a new health insurance plan for consumers in certain instances to allow for continuity of care with an existing health care provider.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, in relation to circumstances under which a consumer may be subject to a new special open enrollment period to choose a new health insurance plan
